name: Spider Plant
careInstructions: Keep in bright, indirect sunlight. Water when the top inch of soil is dry.
commonProblems: Brown tips on leaves, yellowing leaves

name: Snake Plant
careInstructions: Thrives in low light; let soil dry completely between waterings.
commonProblems: Leaf tips may turn brown if overwatered.

name: Pothos
careInstructions: Tolerates low light but prefers bright, indirect light. Water when soil is dry.

name: Peace Lily
careInstructions: Prefers low to medium, indirect light. Keep soil moist but not soggy.
commonProblems: Brown tips can indicate underwatering or low humidity.

name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
careInstructions: Needs bright, indirect light. Rotate occasionally for even growth.
commonProblems: Dropping leaves can indicate overwatering or temperature changes.
